description:
The Akudarma trio head to Denmark in the 19th century to find the children’s book writer, Hans Christian Andersen. When they get there, they find a mermaid sitting on a rock on the beach but something seems strange about them. It was actually Andersen dressed up as a mermaid. Apparently he had fallen in love with the Little Mermaid, which he had created and wanted to give her a ring with the Dynamond on it. Tokio and Calen then show up and Calen and Bimajo have a mermaid contest in order to see who’ll get the Dynamond…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sekaiteki na Heroine Ningyohime ni Anata mo Nareru Bikkuri Dokkuri na Houhou to wa!?
What`s the Super Surprising Way That Even You Can Become the World-Renowned Heroine, the Little Mermaid?!
世界的なヒロイン人魚姫にあなたもなれるビックリドッキリな方法とは!?
